title: Mobile-based Knowledge Construction Inquiry Project: Advanced Elementary Social Studies Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary social studies concepts and experience with digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Constructing a social studies knowledge system applicable to actual elementary education settings through smartphone-based collaborative learning

learning_goals: Learners proactively participate three or more times in theory-building discussions with peers using online collaboration tools (Miro, Padlet, etc.)
Learners write weekly participation strategy reports reflecting metacognition in mobile environments and suggest improvement plans
Learners complete three inquiry-based projects (e.g., social issue analysis reports) over 12 weeks and submit final outputs incorporating peer feedback (two or more rounds)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
